meaningMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>connect</kanji>, which makes this <vocabulary>to be connected to</vocabulary>. In other situations, this can also mean <vocabulary>to be tied together</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>to lead to</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You already learned this reading with the kanji, so you should be good to go!
